parameters.name: CustomerGatewayId
parameters.description:
The ID of the customer gateway.

> If you do not specify a customer gateway ID, the system queries all customer gateways in the current region by default.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where the customer gateway is deployed.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group to which the customer gateway belongs.

You can call the [ListResourceGroups](~~158855~~) operation to query the resource group list.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags to be added to the customer gateway.
